description: This source file implements an in-memory thread-safe notes repository, providing CRUD operations for notes using a concurrent dictionary.

classes.name: InMemoryNotesRepository
classes.description: A thread-safe in-memory repository for notes, implementing INotesRepository interface.

methods.name: GetAll
methods.description: Retrieves all notes ordered by the most recent update.

methods.name: GetById
methods.description: Fetches a note by its unique identifier.

methods.name: Add
methods.description: Adds a new note to the repository.

methods.name: Update
methods.description: Updates an existing note; returns false if the note does not exist.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Removes a note by its ID from the repository.
